mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR_TYPE, MEMO, RUN_ID, PROCESS_SUBJECT FROM BPM_RUN_LOG WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BPM_RUN_LOG( ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR_TYPE, MEMO, RUN_ID, PROCESS_SUBJECT ) values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operatorType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BPM_RUN_LOG SET USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR_TYPE=#{operatorType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, MEMO=#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_ID=#{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_SUBJECT=#{processSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID=#{id}
